A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Mr. Johnson\, really did not deliver what the fans wanted. It was not a bad movie\, but not\, a great one. Mr. Johnson ignored or dismissed all the questions we wanted\, and added the unneeded and unnecessary.  Mr. Abrams is going to have a very difficult time putting the pieces back together again\, for the next saga film. MAY THE FORCE BE WITH HIM.
